name: The Joy of Creation PS1
description:
Collect all the objetives before Freddy catch you!

WASD - Move arround.

Mouse - Look arround.

F - Flashlight.

Shift - Run (toggle).

Note:

I started creating this game to practice with Unity and its components, it's the first "full" game I've made and I'm very excited to publish it.

And I say "complete", but it's not, I wanted to add more content but my old laptop where I had the Unity project stopped working so I abandoned the game, until now, when I decide to publish it.

It's not a serious game anyway, it's just a bad copy of a good original game.

Enjoy...?
